videos.description: Justin Robinson beats the half-time buzzer with deep 3, to push Virginia Tech's lead over Ball State to 43-29.
videos.headline: Virginia Tech's Robinson launches deep buzzer-beating 3-pointer

videos.description: A fan at the Charleston Classic fends off an errant pass heading towards his child, but ends up spilling his beer in the process.
videos.headline: Fan protects child from wild pass with quick-thinking kick save
